DOC.detailed_description: Patients unresectable , locally advanced adenocarcinoma pancreas receive Stereotactic Body Radiation Therapy ( SBRT ) dose 6 Gy daily , 5 day . In Cohort A , MEDI4736 give , subject receive 10 mg/kg MEDI4736 every 2 week , day , first dose SBRT deliver ( within 4 hour ) . In Cohort B , tremelimumab give , subject receive 10 mg/kg tremelimumab every 4 week , day , first dose SBRT deliver ( within 4 hour ) . In Cohort C , MEDI4736 tremelimumab give combination , subject receive 10 mg/kg tremelimumab every 4 week , day , first dose SBRT deliver ( within 4 hour ) , follow 10 mg/kg MEDI4736 every 4 week .
